chapters.title: Chapter 6: A Knack
chapters.info: Prince Kaisel Noramaga, p. 181—Grandson of the Queen of Kandor. He is a boy, not yet a man. He insisted on joining Lan's ride to Malkier, and still fights at his side despite being Kandori, not Malkieri. He still looks too young to fight, though he has proven himself to be as cool-headed as any veteran.
